name: Trimbakeshwar
significance: Seventh of the 12 Jyotirlingas. Features a unique three-faced Linga representing the Trimurti. Source of the sacred Godavari River.
established_date: Ancient site, current structure by Peshwa Bajirao (18th century)
best_time: July to March, Shravan month, Sinhastha Kumbh (every 12 years)
